channel.title: My Server Doesnt Work
channel.description:
Why Does My Server Not Work Ive Downloaded The Ip Doc Thingy And The Source And Ive Done The Router But When People Try And Logg In Says "Error Connecting To Server"
If You Can Help Me Then thats sweet add me on msn if you know whats the problem
sharecode@hotmail.com
ive also got teamviewer

item.title: My Server Doesnt Work
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

to connect to it use 127.0.0.1, and for others to connect they use your no-ip.

Read full topic

item.title: My Server Doesnt Work
item.dc:creator: @klomp3 klomp3
item.description:
@klomp3 wrote:

sharecode, portforward via your router… it should work then…

Read full topic

item.title: My Server Doesnt Work
item.dc:creator: @sharecode sharecode
item.description:
@sharecode wrote:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:6, topic:308485”]go to file>preferences (or hit ctrl+p) and go to connection and then there will be a box (randomize port at each start) either ticked or unticked if it is ticked then untick it! Also, make sure the box: add exception for windows firewall is ticked
now in the blank box enter port no. (43594 or 5555) and hit save then go to file>exit (you must exit it this way or it wont close properly) and then run your server and reopen utorrent and u should get this message:
[2009-10-14 16:04:28] TCP port bind failed 0.0.0.0:43594: (10048) Only one usage of each socket address (protocol/network address/port) is normally permitted.

if you get that message then the port if forwarded fine

—James—[/quote] i did everything u said and i open utorrent again but it didnt say that message[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2009, 08:50:33 pm[/size][hr]Where it says proxy server/type i clicked Http but i dont get what it means by Proxy Server,Port:8080 and the rest below

Read full topic

item.title: My Server Doesnt Work
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

go to file>preferences (or hit ctrl+p) and go to connection and then there will be a box (randomize port at each start) either ticked or unticked if it is ticked then untick it! Also, make sure the box: add exception for windows firewall is ticked
now in the blank box enter port no. (43594 or 5555) and hit save then go to file>exit (you must exit it this way or it wont close properly) and then run your server and reopen utorrent and u should get this message:
[2009-10-14 16:04:28] TCP port bind failed 0.0.0.0:43594: (10048) Only one usage of each socket address (protocol/network address/port) is normally permitted.

if you get that message then the port if forwarded fine

—James—

Read full topic
